name: Arachnophobia (itch) (Caelus Zimmer)
description:
Arachnophobia is a small game that's inspired by the likes of the PS1's Silent Hill and Resident Evil games where you must run away from a Giant Spider that wants to prevent you from collecting 3 pieces of an Ancient Tablet that have been scattered across your home.

Controls:

WASD for General Movement

Left Shift to Sprint 

LeftClick to pick up objects 

RightClick to Drop current items

TAB to pause
